casebody.data:
Lockwood v. Canfield. Appeal from Marshall District Court — Saturday, January 28. Street &. Lamb for-, the appellant' — Henderson Bros. & Merrman for the appellee. -

Action of replevin for a horse. The question involved related to ■ the sufficiency of the evidence to sustain the judgment. No, questions •of law that would interest the profession were discussed. The judgment of the court below was affirmed as being sustained by the ■evidence.

Day, J., delivering the opinion.
